info.name: DoNotTrack
info.description: Stops Discord from tracking everything you do like Sentry and Analytics. Support Server: bit.ly/ZeresServer

changelog.title: What's New?
items: Added the ability to disable the process monitor. Thanks, @Qwerasd!

defaultConfig.name: Stop Process Monitor
defaultConfig.note: This setting stops Discord from monitoring the processes on your PC and prevents your currently played game from showing.
